p: The obtained results indicated that chloroform fraction exhibited maximum inhibitory potential 90.8% with IC 50 value 160.2 ± 1.85 μM followed by ethyl acetate fraction 82.7% with IC 50 of 86.2 ± 2.00. The methanolic extract also showed promising activity with % inhibition of 80.2% with IC 50 value 110.6 ± 2.66 μg, respectively. The daturaolone isolated from most active frication showed potent activity 98.7% with IC 50 value 830.4 ± 2.01 μM as compared to the standard drug having 90.2% inhibition with IC 50 value 840.4 ± 1.74 μM ( Table 1). The bioactivity of the chloroform extract are correlated due to the presence of daturaolone.
